meanings.definition: Lacking sides or having no sides.
meanings.sent1: The sideless box was easy to assemble.
meanings.sent2: The sideless dress was unique and modern.
meanings.sent3: The sideless chair looked like it forgot its sides at home.
meanings.sent4: The sideless puzzle was a mind-bending challenge.
meanings.sent5: The sideless room felt open and spacious.

meanings.definition: Not having a side or sides.
meanings.sent1: She admired the sideless table for its simplicity.
meanings.sent2: The sideless cube was an intriguing geometric shape.
meanings.sent3: The sideless bookshelf seemed to defy the laws of physics.
meanings.sent4: His sideless argument left everyone speechless.
meanings.sent5: The sideless wall created an illusion of endless space.
